chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
ndN = fix ndN (m : fmap) : nat := match m with | V => 0%nat | I m0 x _ _ => if exd_dec m0 x then ndN m0 else (1 + ndN m0)%nat | L m0 _ _ _ => ndN m0 end : fmap -> nat
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
Iter_rem_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Fix Rs_wf (fun _ : set => set) (Iter_rem_F m z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
R2 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
LR3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
R3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
not_exds_Iter_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), let n := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
Iter_upb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem_aux m z s))%nat : fmap -> dart -> set -> nat
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
Iter_orb_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem_aux m z s) : fmap -> dart -> set -> set
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f_1 m) n z)
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
Iter_rem = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Iter_rem_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) : fmap -> dart -> set
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), (card (Ds s z) <= card s)%nat
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Rs_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> Rs (Ds s z) s

```coq
intros m z s.
pose sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s.
pose n := Iter_upb_aux m z s.
assert (H: ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)).
{ apply not_exds_rem_upb. }
exact H.
Qed.```
